languages.text: {n}Энрих опускает голову.{/n} "Понимаю. Надеюсь, однажды мы сможем искупить грех перед династией. В таком случае мы бросим силы на поиск бреши в служебных туннелях. Ударить в спину предателям мы не сможем, но преградим им пути к бегству своими телами и топорами".

{n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."
languages.original_text: {n}Энрих опускает голову.{/n} "Понимаю. Надеюсь, однажды мы сможем искупить грех перед династией. В таком случае мы бросим силы на поиск бреши в служебных туннелях. Ударить в спину предателям мы не сможем, но преградим им пути к бегству своими телами и топорами".

languages.text: {n}Einrich penche la tête.{/n} « Je comprends. J'espère qu'un jour, notre peuple arrivera à racheter sa faute. Puisque nous ne pouvons pas entrer, nous allons concentrer nos efforts sur la recherche d'une brèche dans les tunnels de maintenance. À défaut d'attaquer les traîtres par surprise, nous pourrons au moins faire usage de nos corps et nos haches pour les empêcher de s'enfuir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich penche la tête.{/n} « Je comprends. J'espère qu'un jour, notre peuple arrivera à racheter sa faute. Puisque nous ne pouvons pas entrer, nous allons concentrer nos efforts sur la recherche d'une brèche dans les tunnels de maintenance. À défaut d'attaquer les traîtres par surprise, nous pourrons au moins faire usage de nos corps et nos haches pour les empêcher de s'enfuir. »

languages.text: {n}Einrich agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Lo entiendo. Espero que podamos redimirnos a ojos de la dinastía algún día. Ya que no podemos pasar, centraremos nuestros esfuerzos en encontrar la brecha en los túneles de mantenimiento. No atacaremos a los traidores, pero al menos bloquearemos sus rutas de escape con nuestros cuerpos y nuestras hachas».
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Lo entiendo. Espero que podamos redimirnos a ojos de la dinastía algún día. Ya que no podemos pasar, centraremos nuestros esfuerzos en encontrar la brecha en los túneles de mantenimiento. No atacaremos a los traidores, pero al menos bloquearemos sus rutas de escape con nuestros cuerpos y nuestras hachas».

languages.text: {n}艾因里奇垂下了头。{/n}“我能理解。希望有朝一日，我们能赎清我们的罪过。既然您不允许我们参战，那我们打算集中精力检查附近的维修隧道，看看有没有敌人挖出来的大洞。我们不会对那些叛徒发起突袭，但至少，我们可以依靠斧头与血肉之躯，挡住敌人的逃跑路线。”
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾因里奇垂下了头。{/n}“我能理解。希望有朝一日，我们能赎清我们的罪过。既然您不允许我们参战，那我们打算集中精力检查附近的维修隧道，看看有没有敌人挖出来的大洞。我们不会对那些叛徒发起突袭，但至少，我们可以依靠斧头与血肉之躯，挡住敌人的逃跑路线。”

languages.text: {n}アインリッヒは頭を下げた。 {/n}「わかりました。いつか王朝の前で汚名を返上したいです。私たちは中に入れないかもしれないので、メンテナンストンネルの裂け目を見つけることに全力を注ぎます。裏切り者への奇襲攻撃はしませんが、少なくとも我々の肉体と斧で逃げ道を塞ぎます」
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."

traits.locale_text: {n}アインリッヒは頭を下げた。 {/n}「わかりました。いつか王朝の前で汚名を返上したいです。私たちは中に入れないかもしれないので、メンテナンストンネルの裂け目を見つけることに全力を注ぎます。裏切り者への奇襲攻撃はしませんが、少なくとも我々の肉体と斧で逃げ道を塞ぎます」

languages.text: {n}Einrich lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Ich hoffe, wir werden uns eines Tages die Gnade der Dynastie verdienen. Da wir nicht eintreten dürfen, konzentrieren wir uns darauf, den Durchgang in den Wartungstunneln zu finden. Wir werden keinen Überraschungsangriff gegen die Verräter unternehmen, doch zumindest werden wir ihnen mit unseren Körpern und Äxten den Fluchtweg versperren."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einrich lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Ich hoffe, wir werden uns eines Tages die Gnade der Dynastie verdienen. Da wir nicht eintreten dürfen, konzentrieren wir uns darauf, den Durchgang in den Wartungstunneln zu finden. Wir werden keinen Überraschungsangriff gegen die Verräter unternehmen, doch zumindest werden wir ihnen mit unseren Körpern und Äxten den Fluchtweg versperren."

languages.text: {n}Einrich başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Umarım bir gün hanedanlığın huzurunda kendimizi affettirebiliriz. İçeri giremediğimize göre çabamızı, bakım tünellerindeki gediği bulmaya odaklayacağız. Hainlere sürpriz bir saldırı gerçekleştirmeyeceğiz ama en azından kaçış yollarını bedenlerimizle ve baltalarımızla kapatacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Einrich hangs his head.{/n} "I understand. I hope we will redeem ourselves before the dynasty one day. Since we may not enter, we will focus our efforts on finding the breach in the maintenance tunnels. We won't launch a surprise attack on the traitors, but at least we'll block their escape routes with our bodies and axes."
